Source?
In description it says Frames 25, so then it is not Blue-ray rip, what is it then?
"HD Source....: 1080P BluRay 
FRAME RATE...: 25.000Fps 
VIDEO CODEC..: X264
AUDIO CODEC..: AC3
RESOLUTION...: 1904x1056
RUNTIME......: 105 MINS "
If it would be 105 min must be 23.976 frames.
Then the metadata says 1h 40mn.
What a mess!
Your aspect ratio is 1:80 and it should be : 1.85
I'm afraid this "rip" is some upscaled fake hd.
Average to low encoding settings too.
I'm prety sure the Machete.2010.BluRay.720p.DTS.x264.CHD
is much more worth it. yes, DTS not 448KB/s AC3 like in this torrent, lol ;-)

video quality somewhat equivalent to a 700Mb DVD rip, not a 7gig HD rip!

Its pretty funnny how nobody can seem to get the hint that the grainy quality of this film is intentional and not a problem with the upload. For followers of the work of Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez this type of film making is no suprise. Try watching Grindhouse (the double feature film from which the fake Machete trailer first originated) and then maybe you'll understand whats going on here.
